snippet: Chancellor Angela Merkel was ready to press President Vladimir V. Putin on his government’s repressive measures, but he countered with new criticism of the band Pussy Riot.
abstract: Growing strain in longstanding alliance between Russia and Germany is evident as Pres Vladimir V Putin bats away complaints by German chancellor Angela Merkel about Russia’s human rights record.
lead_paragraph: Chancellor Angela Merkel was ready to press President Vladimir V. Putin on his government’s repressive measures, but he countered with new criticism of the band Pussy Riot.

headline.seo: In Russia, Putin and Merkel Spar Over Rights
headline.main: Between Putin and Merkel, There’s a Chill in the Air
headline.print_headline: Between Putin and Merkel, There’s a Chill in the Air
